text: Full Blast is a 1999 Canadian movie, directed by Rodrigue Jean. ==Cast== * David La Haye as Steph * Martin Desgagné as Piston * Louise Portal as Rose * Marie-Jo Thério as Marie-Lou * Patrice Godin as Charles * Daniel Desjardins as Chico * Luc Proulx as Steph's father * Danica Arsenault as Juliette * Danny Jacobs as Curt (uncredited) ==Other websites== * Category:1999 movies Category:Canadian movies
title: Full Blast (1999 movie)
